text: I don't think it's unreasonable to wait 1-2 hours for a merge. If someone needs something in a time-sensitive manner, they can ask here.

elements.text: I don't think it's unreasonable to wait 1-2 hours for a merge. If someone needs something in a time-sensitive manner, they can ask here.

text:
That's not entirely true.
Not all Julia users are on this slack.
And nothing tells you to come join this channel if you want a registration sped up.
Plus I don't think we have all timezones covered.
Noone is officially "oncall" are they?

elements.text:
That's not entirely true.
Not all Julia users are on this slack.
And nothing tells you to come join this channel if you want a registration sped up.
Plus I don't think we have all timezones covered.
Noone is officially "oncall" are they?

text:
And 1-2 hours is absolutely unreasonable in a lot of cases.
Waiting an average of 6 minutes (which is what it is configured to be) is fine if you want to do a series of dependent releases.
1-2 hours means it is basically impossible to get a series of >2 releases made in a day without come to this channel and bugging someone for a manual merge
